FileMockResponse.description: Mock response definition based on file content

code.description: HTTP status code which will be sent in the mock response

delay.description: Delay before sending the mock response

file.description: Path to the file whose content will be sent in the mock response

headers.description: HTTP headers which will be sent in the mock response

oneOf.description: Host mapping definition
Host mapping definition

cache.description: List the paths that will be cached.

from.description: The local host with protocol and port for the resource from which proxying will take place (e.g., http://localhost:8080). Port defaults to 80 for HTTP and 443 for HTTPS if not specified.

rewrites.description: List of paths that will be rewritten.

statics.description: List of paths that will be served from the directory.

to.description: The target host and protocol for the resource that needs to be proxied

disabled.description: Disable OPTIONS request handling and all requests will be proxied to the target server

headers.description: Custom headers to be sent in response to OPTIONS requests

status.description: Custom status code to be sent in response to OPTIONS requests

RawMockResponse.description: Mock response definition based on raw content

delay.description: Delay before sending the mock response

headers.description: HTTP headers which will be sent in the mock response

raw.description: Content which will be sent in the mock response

dir.description: Path to the folder from which the static files will be served

index.description: The file witch will be returned if the requested file is not found. It should be a relative path within the dir folder

path.description: Path where the static files will be served

description: Configuration file for uncors reverse proxy

methods.description: List of http methods with can be cached

key-file.description: Path to matching for certificate private key

mappings.description: A list of mappings that describe how to forward requests. Ports are specified in the 'from' URL (e.g., http://localhost:8080).

proxy.description: HTTP/HTTPS proxy to provide requests to real server (used system by default)

title: Uncors configuration
